about_the_game:
This DLC contains pictures of all girls from the Hentai Shooter 2 (Uncensored Edition).
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.
Artist: Afanasiy Kudrin.

content_descriptors.notes: The DLC have nude content. You will find, naked girls in it.
